name: Through The Shadows
blurb: "Through The Shadows" is a suspenseful new adventure game for Windows PC

rewards.reward: You have my appreciation and your name will be listed in our "Thank You" game page on the True Light Games website.
Same as the previous reward, plus you receive the full game digital download as soon as it is complete.
Same as previous reward, plus you receive the entire game music soundtrack digital download.

Same as previous reward, but in addition to your name listed in the website "Thank You" game page, you will be listed in the official game credits "Special Thanks." The official game credits will be listed on the game page on the website in the form of a YouTube video.
Same as previous reward. In addition, we ask that you include your favorite Bible verse along with your name credit in the "Special Thanks" official game credits.

Same as previous reward, plus receive special exclusive project updates throughout the months of creation, where I will not only let you know inside information on the game's progress, but I will ask for feedback that can make the game even better!

Same as previous reward. In addition, not only will your favorite Bible verse be included in your official game "Thank You" credit, but I will incorporate your verse in a special puzzle inside the game!
Same as previous reward. In addition, "Sponsor A Song"! That's right, pledge $200 and I will add an additional song to the game soundtrack!
Same as previous reward. In addition, I will create a new secret area in one of the game levels and mention it in the official game credits on the game website!

Same as previous reward, but instead of a secret area in one of the game levels, I will add an entire new level to the game and it will be dedicated to you in the official game credits on the website!

Same as previous reward. But, not only will I create a game level dedicated to you, I will create a "game progress" video to post on our YouTube and website, using the creation of your game level. This will allow you, and everyone else, the ability to see the creation of this special part of the game as a 'behind the scenes' video of the game's progress!

Same as previous reward. In addition, I will create an official game advertising Trailer completely sponsored by you. This will be placed on our YouTube and website, and will be used to advertise the game before its release. There will be a 'sponsored by' credit on the website with the video.

Same as previous reward. In addition, I will add a new voice character to the game! As the game stands right now, there is the voice part for "Jesse", which is the character you play in the game. There is also the "Narrator" who shares valuable information about clues in the game, helps guide Jesse's future decisions, and adds a great dimension to the game. With this reward pledge, I will add an additional character voice to the game, which will appear occasionally as a voice coming from a television or radio within the game.

Same as previous reward. In addition, I will create a special 5-level game completely funded by your pledge, with its own separate game page on the website! This special game will be designed in-progress during the creation of the main game project. I will send you exclusive behind-the-scenes video footage as a private YouTube link that I send only to you, and you will be able to share the video link with your friends. This exclusive mini-game will actually be the story that leads up to the main "Episode One" game. It will be the same look and style as the main game project, but provide some back-story and will be released shortly after the main game project. You will be the only person to see progress on this secret mini-game until its release! When it is completed, after the full game's release, you will receive a free digital download of your special 5-level mini-game. Then, it will be for sale to the public before the release of "Episode Two" if I decide to create the next game that follows.
